import React from 'react' import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import ModelBody from './ModalBody'; function TaskModal(props) { if (typeof props.data === 'undefined') return
// return empty div if data not set return (

{props.data[0].Task_type[0].toUpperCase() + props.data[0].Task_type.substring(1)} Task:

{props.data[0].Tittle}
) } export default TaskModal
